These exist to be a fap material, if you don't like it, or if you get bored of the usual NTR plot, then just STFU and go away.

Hard-NTR so not for me. Shame too, I really wanted to fav something from this series to keep an eye on the author going forward, but all of the chapters just have something missing. Ch1 is like half a sleeping/drug scene, which I find pretty boring; ch2 is short and breaks up the sex with a character scene, an aspect of NTR series I find annoying; Ch3 obviously has the MC find out about the NTR, and then ends with the ‘bad end’ bait; and finally Ch4 is just goes full on Hard-NTR cliches, with the dude watching and crying, clearly suffering yada yada. Like, it’s not even the literal concept of “stealing” that turns me off NTR. I don’t like it -obviously- but I can tolerate it. It’s hard-NTRs seemingly required focus on emotional suffering of some dude that turns me off; I don’t “feel bad” for the dude, I just get turned off when the focus of my porn is on a random dude crying. Hats off to those who can ignore that, I mean it, y’all have some top tier artists churning out doujins for ya.
atleast this have proper ending... unlike the other ntr series...

body: All NTR is beauty and no brain. An inconsequential seriate chain of events that only needs barely enough reasons to continue with the sex scenes. Alas, this was made just to be pretty and give people hard-ons, not to be pleased on well-crafted plots; only there to satisfy a market and make money (probably), nothing else.
